nodes.text: Eanjer Kunarazti was a Human male living on the planet Wukkar whose father owned Polestar Imports. Eanjer was killed, along with his father, by Black Sun. Several weeks later, Boba Fett, disguised as Eanjer, convinced smuggler Han Solo to break into the Marblewood Estate to supposedly retrieve money that Black Sun Sector Chief Avrak Villachor had stolen. However, it was simply a plot to allow Fett to kill a Black Sun vigo named Qazadi.
